description: This Java class defines a simulated command event for arming or disarming a system via an ACE client in a Zigbee core mock environment. It extends ClusterCommandEvent and constructs a payload including mode, access code, and zone ID.

classes.name: ArmCommandEvent
classes.description: A class representing a command event to arm/disarm the system in the mock Zigbee environment

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Constructs the byte array payload for the arming/disarming command, including mode, access code, and zone ID
